name.description: The name of the attribute, shall be provided at least in English. Language for a string is indicated with @CC tag.

identifier.description: A unique identifier for the attribute in form of a URI according to RFC3986

description.description: A human-friendly description of the attribute, to be provided at least in English. Language for a string is indicated with @CC tag.

semanticDataSpecification.description: optional URI pointing to semantic data specification of the attribute in the OOTS Semantic Repository

distributions.description: array of SchemaDistribution objects that contain the URL pointing to each schema distribution's access URL and its media type.

nameSpace.description: Optional URI assigned for the attribute's exact namespace (if not the one pointed at by namespace element in identifier, which can be a local SDG namespace).

contactInfo.description: Array of URIs that provide the contact information of the entity which requested to include the attribute in the catalogue of attributes.

legalBasis.description: Reference to the legal basis for the attribute.

authenticSources.description: An array of data services for verification of the attribute value from an authentic source.

DataService.title: DataService
DataService.description: Represents a data service providing an endpoint for authentic source.

country.description: Specifies the member state through a country code.

nationalSubID.description: Optional identifier, that narrows down a respective authentic source in the member state defined in country.

endpointDescription.description: A description of the services available via the endpoint. The property gives specific details of the actual endpoint instances.

endpointURI.description: URI of the root location or primary endpoint of the service (an IRI) for either verifying or retrieving data from the service.

SchemaDistribution.title: Schema distribution
SchemaDistribution.description: A schema distribution object that contains a schema distribution's access URL and media type.

accessURL.description: The URL which gives access to the schema distribution.

mediaType.description: The media type of the attribute's data model schema instance, string value 'application/json-schema' for the mandatory JSON schema.
